0: hope you are having a good day and I was met with a grumpy gruff response in both instances for the male it was at the restroom by Starbucks and at the bar for the female housekeeper it was at my room for cleaning and in the hallway
The room was fine but after a long day
How expensive it was and the rooms were really really tiny
Placement of the bathroom was different and I could not find a bathroom fan so mirror fogged over when taking a shower
Biggest problem was lack of water pressure and the periodic smell of sewage that seeped through the room
Regardless we go up to our room and I decided to call down to see if we needed to request the champagne
We were perplexed by the cooler that would keep items at 50 degrees but not lower what is the point why not just put in a refrigerator
As an out of towner I found all the views interesting
Noise was a bit of a problem while in the room
The second room which we were told was an upgrade had a murphy bed instead of a regular bed with an absolutely TERRIBLE mattress
1: Beautiful hotel informative staff loved our view
My room had been recently renovated and it was very nice
Rooms are excellently detailed with large flat screens new beds and fabulous washrooms
They are constantly updating and renovating staying updated and keeping the rooms and common spaces looking amazing
They have very nice showers lots of counter desk space and a very large hi quality LG TV
The view from our room was beautiful seeing the lit city at night and a warm sunrise in the morning
The views from the hotel are awesome
Beds very comfy as was room conditions
Love the water views here from the balcony
The rooms are modern and clean with great views
